title: Mortgage Equity Realisation
description: 住宅所有者は、資産を売却したときに、毎月お金が出ていく中で、自分の持分（％）の所有権の利益を実現することができます。

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal did not address a business model with NFTs at the core. (NFT is not mentioned in the proposal). I would like the team to expand on how they will deliver value to the Cardano ecosystem and how they will incorporate NFTs in their business model. Furthermore, the problem statement and solution is disconnected and must be clarified, the solution does not demonstrate how to solve the problem presented.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal requires further development to ensure successful implementation. I would want to see links to LinkedIn or similar to provide additional detail/evidence about the team work history, education and past experiences. I would like the team to expand on the responsibilities and deliverables of each member, this way we can better judge whether there is a work overload in one area. I advise the team to develop a risk assessment considering the challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation, the team needs to think: "what needs to be true for this project to succeed".
f6_assessments.q2: I would like to see the team further develop Key Performance Indicators (KPI's) for the project, and connect the KPIs to the milestones on the project roadmap (timeline). I would like to see the team create a solid roadmap -  develop and add milestones to provide deeper detail, set technical development milestones for creating the product. I would like to see the budget developed beyond a single line entry and broken down into monthly spending, and I would like the team to connect the KPI's and roadmap milestones to the spending, what are the specific tasks and deliverables that the labor must provide and when must they deliver the tasks – this breakdown will give a clearer indication about the implementation workload feasibility and match the deliverables to the spending - thus the team can track performance and spending over a timeline. As the project stands at the moment, I feel the project will be challenging to audit.

f6_assessments.q0: Proposer is on a good track, but does not get anywhere. Holding a mortgage on an NFT is indeed a good NFT business model: so, I do think the proposal itself addresses the challenge: just not effectively.
f6_assessments.q1:
$50,000 for a plan not yet developed will not likely succeed. As others have commented: there are lacking details to determine how these NFT mortgages would be minted, or how the research would lead to the end result of minted mortgages. In the absence of this information could have been budget breakdowns of where the $50,000 would be spent to obtain the answers needed that are outlined in the downloadable image that explains more in detail.
There just needs to be more information of how goals are obtained, and if the proposer does or does not have the abilities to have the proposal succeed then who they will turn to in order to attempt this success.
f6_assessments.q2: Overall: more information is needed. Even if solid solutions at this stage is lacking for the proposer, and if that is what some of the $50K would be for: this at least needs to show within the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: Terrific idea in theory and may well add value to the Cardano ecosystem based on the identification of a valid problem and prospective solution (the later could have been worded a little clearer). This real estate sector certainly has potential to scale up dramatically should the solution become a proven, risk free venture. I do get a sense that a lot more work is required to get to that stage and the market may be very competitive. Having said that this is the type of proposal that may develop with further iteration and onboarding of further team members via collaboration within the Cardano community.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal needs to address a number of fundamental requirements to score higher in this category. I could not verify the experience of the proposer at all although a read through of the attachment suggests knowledge of the sector and some analysis of market and risks associated therein. The plan is too simple at this stage to gain any insight into how the budget funds will be used and this may be presented at a later time in a future fund. I would suggest to the proposer that it is far better to ask for greatly reduced funds and tackle the conceptual issues at stage. This grows trust and authenticates experience and delivery allowing for further budget in future funding rounds.
f6_assessments.q2: The information provided is interesting and certainly points towards a project that may be a winner in future funding rounds. Simply put at present this proposal does not meet the minimum requirements on a number of categories including breakdown of budget, auditability metrics/KPI's and will need a good deal more work to get it to the implementation stage. As stated earlier, great idea, please continue to develop the idea, seek out valued partnerships and reiterate for a future funding round.

solution: 私は、資産の中に所有されている株式をリアルタイムで実現し、その資産がお手軽に収益を上げられるようにステークしています。
experience: ブロックチェーンとプロップテックの問題解決に関する知識を持つ、不動産開発＆プランニング部門での経験
